page.title: 07THE MEDIA IN WOODHOUSE
page.content:
We gave{questionnaires to children {in the Junior school}and from these were able to make the following table of information about the national and local media services{which come into {our homes.
A NATIONAL DAILY NEWSPAPER (TABLOID) 73% OTHER NATIONAL DAILY NEWSPAPER 38% MORE THAN ONE DAILY NEWSPAPER 25% SUNDAY NEWSPAPER 58% LOCAL WEEKLY NEWSPAPER 52% LOCAL FREE WEEKLY NEWSPAPER 56%
AT LEAST ONE RADIO 73%
BLACK & WHITE T.V. SET 59% COLOUR T.V. SET 78% T.V. SET WITH TELETEXT 28% CABLE T.V. 28% { Class 8 S.E.
